text_paragraphs: Information Note on the Court’s case-law 21
The case concerns the length of criminal proceedings (4 years, 9 months and 19 days).
Article 41 – The Court considered that the finding of a violation constituted sufficient just satisfaction in respect of the non-pecuniary damage claimed by the applicant.

This summary by the Registry does not bind the Court.
